attributes.additional_details: This petition is too call for the government  to have the drug citalopram to be reviewed as almost a 'go too' drug for GP's as the common side effects are horrific for the people who try to cope with the first month of taking citalopram. Many psychiatrists will say that citalopram is a awful drug and often take their patients off the drug (Source People that have spoke about citalopram in the general public)
